title: Gas Nomination and Scheduling
description: A gas scheduler needs to nominate (request) the amount of natural gas needed from an interstate pipeline for the next day to serve its customers.

tasks.description: Forecast the total gas demand for all customers for the next day based on weather and historical data.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates an hourly gas demand forecast.

tasks.description: Submit a nomination to the pipeline operator's electronic bulletin board for the forecasted volume.
tasks.expected_outcome: System successfully submits the gas nomination.

tasks.description: Receive confirmation from the pipeline that the nomination has been scheduled.
tasks.expected_outcome: System receives and logs the confirmation.
